conclusion: The height of car headlights from the ground is 92.8 cm.
Figure B shows a headlight structure with a rotating paraboloid and a hemispherical lens.
A light blocking plate is installed below the symmetry axis, and the light source is at the focal point F.
Light enters the lens perpendicular to the vertical diameter MN of the hemispherical lens.
The refractive index of the light in the hemispherical lens is n = 4/3.
Determine the length of the transparent part of all the light entering perpendicular to MN on the lens spherical surface.
